org.genericsystem.api.core

Interface Cache

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Context

    public interface Cache
extends Context
    A Cache is an environment where Generic are temporarily stored.
    It is mount on a sub-context that is a Cache or a transaction.
    A Cache is never threadsafe.
    Author:
    Nicolas Feybesse, Michael Ory

      • find

        <T extends Generic> T find(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
        Find the Generic defined by class param or create it if it doesn't exist.
        This class must be @SystemGeneric annotated.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class must be @SystemGeneric annotated.
        Returns:
        A new Generic or the existing Generic.
        See Also:
        SystemGeneric
